content.string:
[h1]Campaigns[/h1] [list] [*][b]Tilarus-5: SynTek Hospital:[/b] Made alarm sounds louder. [*][b]Bunker:[/b] Removed collision from an invisible ceiling beam. [/list]
[h1]Weapons[/h1] [list] [*][b]ML30 Laser Trip Mine:[/b] Improved network prediction for throwing animation. [/list]
[h1]Misc[/h1] [list] [*]The buildcubemaps command now requires sv_cheats to be enabled. [*]Fixed a crash when an alien tried to throw a physics object at a target who had died. [*]Fixed a crash when leaving a screen with a dropdown menu open. [/list]
Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop Update - MMMMM DD, YYYY
